channel.title: [PI] Quest Interface Rep++
channel.description:
Been trying to figure this out for a long time, how do I make it so when the player clicks on a Quest name in the 'Quest Bar' how do I make the message thing pop up? I do know that it has something to do with the [b][i]SendFrame126[/i][/b] values. But, can someone give me an example?
Thanks.

item.title: [PI] Quest Interface Rep++
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Basicly the sendFrame126() method tells the connected client to update a line of text. This can be quest names, interface headers/content.

sendFrame126(String, stringID);

String is with what you want to update the text, stringID is the location of the text.

For your convenience, here is a list with most of the quest names in the quest tab.
